test.gui

Class GuiControllerMock

  • java.lang.Object
    • Application
      • gui.GUIController
        • test.gui.GuiControllerMock

  • public class GuiControllerMock
extends GUIController
    This class is a simplified version of GUIController for testing of ContentTableController. It contains the locations Germany, France, Ireland, United States of America and Great Britain, and Accounts can be chosen from: TestAccount0 to TestAccount4. These accounts have got 10*i tweets and retweets, as well as 100*i follower.
    Author:
    Philipp
